this update contains bug fixes and improvements -better support for iOS 8( built with ios 8.1 SDK) LAST UPDATE

-unlocked sharing features to messages
-unlocked sharing features to phone
-unlocked sharing features to calendar

-unlocked sharing options for game center

- unlocked more sharing options for notes

-bug fixes(important for google+)

Added support for:
1)google+ you can now Download any image ! download button added)
2)wechat now you can select an unlimited amount of photos and send them
-you can add unlimited group members
-send long videos
